solution_line_template: Both the cheesecake and coffee cost {cheesecake_price} + {coffee_price} = $<<{cheesecake_price}+{coffee_price}={total_initial_price}>>{total_initial_price}.
The discount for these items is {discount_percentage} * {total_initial_price} = $<<{discount_percentage}*{total_initial_price}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount}.
So the final price for the cheesecake and coffee is {total_initial_price} - {discount_amount} = $<<{total_initial_price}-{discount_amount}={final_price}>>{final_price}.
